feed.title: Wiki-Go Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.3.15
entry.content:
• Adds Folder Structure to README (41ffcdf by Amin Persia)
  • Adds disable_file_upload_checking support used for local deployment (14de6da by Amin Persia)
  • Adds updating of anchor links list when the popup is opened (4f3698d by Amin Persia)
  • Adds translations for anchor picker. Translation done by ChatGPT. (cc14772 by Amin Persia)
  • Improves js heading anchor id generation (216cc17 by Amin Persia)
  • Removes homepage from documents list (591ab4c by Amin Persia)
  • Adds headinganchor preprocessor (a44649f by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.3.16
entry.content:
• Some css cleanup (bededbf by Amin Persia)
  • Adds cache-control for static files (af1a572 by Amin Persia)
  • Changes anchor button to first list docs then anchors of the selected doc (514f24e by Amin Persia)
  • Adds hover styles to heading anchors - hidden by default, visible on hover (bb15711 by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.3.17
entry.content:
• improves readme and adds nginx reverse proxy example (78768a8 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds labels to docker image #19 (92784c2 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds native ssl support while keeping reverse proxy support (4e6c29d by Amin Persia)
  • Improves custom favicon handling #14 (7d09d0f by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.3.18
entry.content:
• Adds translations for "keep me logged in" using ChatGPT (b79747c by Amin Persia)
  • Adds translation variables to login page that were missing (a6d038c by Amin Persia)
  • Adds keep me logged in option (22ad5c1 by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.3.19
entry.content:
• Fixes anchor picker last item being clipped and stops it from changing size (7f4fbfd by Amin Persia)
  • Adds the missing styles for hyperlinks in document history preview (bf756ba by Amin Persia)
  • Fixes move/rename button visibility (1919dc6 by Amin Persia)
